item.title: New Window Live Writer released
item.description: I love Windows Live Writer. It makes blogging really easy. I don’t have to worry about spelling, forming my links or the technical aspects of creating an entry. All I have to do is type in this app. and BAM. it works wonders. Anyway, they released a new version of Windows Live Writer. It has all sorts of neat new features (real time spell checking!!) and is pretty snappy. Check out  the release at the Windows Live writer page.
